title: Quick white fish curry
ingredients: ['600g white fish fillets', '1 tbsp vegetable oil', '2 garlic cloves, 1 thinly sliced and 1 crushed', '1 onion, finely chopped', '2 tsp curry powder (mild or medium)', '1 tbsp tomato purée', '1/2 tsp sugar', '1 bay leaf', '2 tbsp crème fraîche', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper']
